data.title: 1 Church Daycare in Centerville, Indiana
data.meta_description: Discover the finest Church Daycare in Centerville, Indiana. Our list of Church Daycare guarantees an incredible daycare search experience for your child.
data.text:
The 2024 monthly average cost of a center based childcare in Centerville, Indiana is $799.00 per month per child. The cost can be higher than $799.00 based on the level of facilities, care, and location.

The average cost of providing center-based care for an infant in the U.S. is $1,230 per month. The federal definition of affordable child care should costs 7% or less of annual household income. However, in Indiana, average cost of childcare is 35.7% of a single parent median income, and 10.5% of a married couple annual income in the state.
